meta.description: Minimize the total travel cost for a truck to visit each city exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities to be visited.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the truck travels from city i to city j.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck leaves city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck leaves city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck leaves city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck leaves city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['1'] for i in CITIES if i != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck enters city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['2'] for i in CITIES if i != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck enters city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['3'] for i in CITIES if i != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck enters city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['4'] for i in CITIES if i != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the truck enters city 4 exactly once.
